title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Complete Ripoff, Defective products
author: Ryan
content: This seller should be removed from Amazon. I understand they are refurbished. But last time I looked, refurbished wasn't a synonym for flaming piece of crap. Arrived scratched to heck. Would not turn on unless it was plugged in, so the battery didn't work. When it was plugged in, it would play music for 5 seconds and then shut off. The music it would play was muffled garbage....obviously every component of this speaker was garbage. I asked the customer service rep why this unit passed their inspection to be sold to a customer, and she couldn't provide an answer. I returned thus piece of trash for a refund. Do not buy anything from this seller!
